CHAPTER 2 ■The Web of Language
Which of the following verbs names a speech act?
1.capturethe suspect6.punishthe defendant
2.assertthat the suspect is guilty7.revokethe defendant’s driver’s license
3.stareaccusingly at the suspect8.welcomethe prisoner to prison
4.findthe defendant guilty9.orderthe prisoner to be silent
5.takethe defendant away10.lockthe cell door
Exercise III
Using a dictionary, find ten verbs that can be used to construct explicit perfor-
